translation.en: GIRL 1: Today's the day. GIRL 2: All right. GIRL 3: I feel good about this one.
translation.es: - Hoy es el día. - Tengo un buen presentimiento.

translation.en: GIRL 1: Us three witches are fire.
translation.es: Las tres somos increíbles. - No sé por qué intentamos sin una cuarta. - Ya empieza.

translation.en: GIRL 2: I don't know why we keep trying without a fourth. GIRL 1: Oh, here she goes.
translation.es: - No sé por qué intentamos sin una cuarta. - Ya empieza.

translation.en: GIRL 2: What? It's been two years. GIRL 1: Maybe we don't need a fourth.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? Ya van dos años. - Quizá no necesitemos una cuarta.

translation.en: GIRL 2: Yeah, you need all four.
Each crescent moon is an element. See? North, south, east, west.
translation.es: Cada luna creciente es un elemento. ¿Ves? Norte, sur, este, oeste.

translation.en: GIRL 3: I wanna freeze time. GIRL 1: We couldn't freeze time if we had a fourth.
translation.es: - Quiero congelar el tiempo. - No podríamos ni con una cuarta.

translation.en: I have it on the table, Frankie.
You need to hold it, or else you're gonna light something on fire.
translation.es: Tienes que detenerlo o vas a incendiar algo.

translation.en: All right, ladies.
GIRL 2: I love this plate.
Don't put it out. I have to. We have to do the ritual.
translation.es: - No lo apagues. - Es necesario para el ritual.

translation.en: Your feather.
Frankie, watch out. You're always lighting things on fire, bro.
translation.es: ¡Cuidado, Frankie! Siempre le prendes fuego a las cosas.

translation.en: Not this time. GIRL 1: Y'all witches ready?
ALL : As the night receives Your light
translation.es: Mientras la noche recibe tu luz

translation.en: And the oceans feel your pull
translation.es: y los océanos sienten tu llamado

translation.en: I set my intention To grow with you
translation.es: afirmo mi intención de crecer contigo

translation.en: From new to full
translation.es: de luna nueva a luna llena.

translation.en: I summon the spirits of the North, spirit of earth and body,
translation.es: Invoco a los espíritus del norte, el espíritu de la tierra y del cuerpo,

translation.en: spirit of dirt.
ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the East,
translation.es: Invoco a los espíritus del este, espíritu del aire,

translation.en: spirit of air, spirit of new beginnings, spirit of breath.
translation.es: Invoco a los espíritus del este, espíritu del aire, espíritu de los nuevos comienzos, espíritu del aliento.

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
I summon the spirits of the South,
translation.es: Invoco a los espíritus del sur, al espíritu del fuego y de la voluntad,

translation.en: spirit of fire and will, spirit of heat.
translation.es: Invoco a los espíritus del sur, al espíritu del fuego y de la voluntad, al espíritu del calor.

translation.en: ALL: Blessed be.
Tabby, can you just pretend you didn't summon the Southern spirits
translation.es: Tabby, ¿puedes fingir que no invocaste a los espíritus del sur

translation.en: and do the spirits of the West?
translation.es: e invocar a los del oeste?

translation.en: What? No. That's whack. I already did mine.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No. Ya invoqué a los míos.

translation.en: Someone needs to. It's not gonna work otherwise.
translation.es: Pues alguien tiene que hacerlo. Si no, no va a funcionar.

translation.en: If we're gonna be honest,
the spirits of the West have been messin' shit up for a while now,
translation.es: los espíritus del oeste han creado problemas desde hace tiempo.

translation.en: so why don't we just leave 'em out. She's got a valid point.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no los olvidamos? - Tiene razón.

translation.en: And, look, anyways, it starts with East.
translation.es: De todas maneras, empieza con el este. Este, sur, oeste...

translation.en: East, South, West--
translation.es: De todas maneras, empieza con el este. Este, sur, oeste... Por eso solo hacemos magia muy básica. Nunca hemos tenido una cuarta.

translation.en: See, this is why we can only do basic magick. We've never had a fourth.
translation.es: Por eso solo hacemos magia muy básica. Nunca hemos tenido una cuarta.

translation.en: How many times have we tried to telepathically communicate?
Oh, my God! You're obsessed with telepathically communicating.
translation.es: ¡No lo puedo creer! ¡Estás obsesionada con la comunicación telepática!

translation.en: Read the book.
So it shall be sealed and done
When all four corners Meet as one
translation.es: cuando las cuatro esquinas se hayan juntado.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait.
Oh, shit!
It's your jam. Yes!
Okay, here we go.
Shit. You know the words.
Aw. Sorry.
Aw, baby. Ugh. Blah.
Oh, no, no, no. You can...cry.
All right, get it out.
Oh, honey, I'm...
I get it, man. This is...
This is weird, though, isn't it?
Look it, we're having all the feels. You'll have to do my makeup when we get there.
translation.es: Nos pusimos supersensibles. Tendrás que maquillarme cuando lleguemos.

translation.en: Turn it back up, please.
How are my brows? They look great.
You look beautiful. Oh, gosh.
You do. Okay. I do.
translation.es: - En serio. - Está bien. Es cierto.

translation.en: You ready? I'm nervous.
Yeah. Yeah. Okay.
All right, let's do this. Okay.
Hello.
Hey. Hey.
I see you made it in one piece. Yeah, it's--
Is that another piece of you I see right here?
translation.es: ¿Es otra parte de ti lo que estoy viendo?

translation.en: Hi, Lily. I finally got you here.
translation.es: Hola, Lily. Por fin logré que vinieras.

translation.en: It's nice to see you again.
translation.es: Me da gusto verte de nuevo.

translation.en: Last time was on your turf though, so now it's my home- court advantage.
translation.es: La última vez fui a tu cancha. Ahora vas a jugar en la mía.

translation.en: That's a sports metaphor.
A metaphor, sort of like analogy. Oh, yeah. I get it.
translation.es: - Una metáfora. Una analogía. - Sí, ya entendí.

translation.en: Yeah, I get it. Dad joke. Guilty.
translation.es: - Ya entendí. - Chiste de papá. Soy culpable.

translation.en: That's a cool camera.
Thanks. HELEN: It is, isn't it?
Let's take a picture. You know? Commemorate the moment.
translation.es: Tomemos una foto. Para conmemorar el momento.

translation.en: That's a great idea.
May I? Okay.
It's not really a selfie thing, but here.
translation.es: - No es para selfies, pero toma. - Claro. ¿Cómo la...?

translation.en: Ooh, wow, analog.
Dig it. Old school.
translation.es: Me encanta. De las de antes.

translation.en: Ready?
All right. Come on in and meet the boys. They're really excited to meet you.
translation.es: Muy bien. Ven a conocer a mis hijos. Están entusiasmados por conocerte.

translation.en: I think they even bathed.
ADAM: This is Isaiah. Hey.
ADAM: Jacob. Hi.
ADAM: And Abe.
Hi.
JACOB: What the hell?
Hey, give Lily the good seat.
translation.es: Denle a Lily el mejor asiento. Muévanse.

translation.en: Move.
Isaiah, just move over!
Cut it out, hey!
Move.
Settle down.
A little birdie told me mint chip was your favorite.
translation.es: Un pajarito me dijo que el de menta es tu favorito.

translation.en: Thanks. Isn't that right, little birdie? Mm- hm.
My beautiful little birdie.
That's gross, Dad.
Hey. Hey.
Nice digs.
You okay?
Yeah.
How you feeling about school tomorrow? Are you excited?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te sientes acerca de las clases mañana? ¿Estás emocionada?

translation.en: You can make some new friends. Well, that would imply that I had old friends.
translation.es: - Vas a hacer nuevas amistades. - Para eso necesitaría viejas amistades.

translation.en: There's gonna be D- bags no matter where you go, right?
translation.es: Siempre va a haber hijos de p en todas partes, ¿no?

translation.en: Mom. It's not nice. Sorry.
It's douchebags.
Douchebags? I was going for dickbags.
translation.es: ¿De perra? Yo iba a decir hijos de puta.

translation.en: All right. Just remember what I always tell you.
translation.es: Solo recuerda lo que siempre te he dicho.

translation.en: Your difference is your power.
translation.es: Aquello que te diferencia de todos es tu poder.

translation.en: Okay, on that note, I'm gonna go unpack.
Love you. I love you.
Hey.
Thank you for just being so cool... Mom.
translation.es: - Gracias por ser tan comprensiva... - Mamá.

translation.en: ...about all of this.
I know it feels fast. Mom, I'm not judging you at all.
translation.es: - Parece muy apresurado. - Yo no te estoy juzgando.

translation.en: I just have not connected to someone like this for so long,
translation.es: No me había llevado tan bien con nadie desde hace mucho.

translation.en: and, God, it just feels really good, like, you know, to have someone to...
translation.es: Se siente tan bien, tener a alguien con quien...

translation.en: I get it.
All right, baby. Get some rest.
Oh...love you. Love you.
Love you, love you, love you. Love you, love you.
translation.es: - Te amo, te amo. - Te amo.

translation.en: What's up?
Nice kicks. Thanks, yo.
Have a good first day. Thanks.
I know why the caged bird Sings, ah me
translation.es: Yo sé por qué canta el pájaro enjaulado ¡Ay, de mí!

translation.en: When his wing is bruised And his bosom sore,--
translation.es: Cuando su ala está herida y su pecho adolorido

translation.en: When he beats his bars And he would be free;
translation.es: Cuando golpea las rejas y desea libertad

translation.en: But a prayer that he sends From his heart's deep core
translation.es: Es una oración que envía desde lo profundo de su corazón

translation.en: But a plea, that upward To Heaven he flings--
translation.es: Una súplica que lanza al cielo

translation.en: I know why The caged bird sings!
translation.es: Yo sé por qué canta el pájaro enjaulado.

translation.en: Okay, this week we're gonna be reading chapters one through four
translation.es: Bien, esta semana leeremos los capítulos del uno al cuatro

translation.en: of Maya Angelou's seminal autobiography, which draws its title--
translation.es: de la autobiografía de Maya Angelou, que debe su título a...

translation.en: Ew! God, are you seeing this?
Timmy. I'm sorry.
TEACHER: Okay, what's going on? TIMMY: Hey.
Hi. I think you dropped something.
translation.es: Creo que se te cayó algo.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
It's super gnarly.
Can we settle down back there, please? Let's go. Jacob.
translation.es: Silencio, por favor. Cállense. - ¡Jacob! - Parece la escena de un crimen.

translation.en: TIMMY: It's like a crime scene.
translation.es: - ¡Jacob! - Parece la escena de un crimen.

translation.en: Hey, hey. All right, enough. Settle down.
GIRL 1: Hello?
I think she's in here.
GIRL 2: Hello?
Listen. It happens to everyone. Timmy's just a dick.
translation.es: Oye, eso le pasa a cualquiera. Timmy es un imbécil.

translation.en: Seriously, don't waste your tears on him. GIRL 2: I mean, you're not alone.
translation.es: En serio, no derrames tus lágrimas por él. No eres la única.

translation.en: He's made us all cry at one point or another.
translation.es: Nos ha hecho llorar a todas en algún momento.

translation.en: Also, girl,
translation.es: Además, escucha... Tu flujo es copioso, y eso es algo para celebrar.

translation.en: your flow is heavy and that is something to celebrate.
translation.es: Tu flujo es copioso, y eso es algo para celebrar.

translation.en: Frankie. Frankie, bro.
What? I'm just saying. Aunt Flo's in from the Redland.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Nada más digo Vino Juana La Colorada.

translation.en: GIRL 1: We brought you some shorts.
I wore 'em in gym, so they're kinda sweaty, but they should fit you.
translation.es: Lo usé en gimnasia, están sudados, pero son de tu talla.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I'll just slide them under the door.
translation.es: Te los paso por debajo de la puerta.

translation.en: LILY: Thank you.
You can sit with us if you want. Not that anybody really wants to sit with us anyways.
translation.es: - Puedes sentarte con nosotras si quieres. - Nadie quiere sentarse con nosotras.

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
Oh, my God. Did he just look at you?
translation.es: - Ay. ¿Se te quedó viendo? - Cálmate, muchacha.

translation.en: Down, girl. Frankie's been in love
translation.es: - Ay. ¿Se te quedó viendo? - Cálmate, muchacha. Frankie ha estado enamorada de Jacob desde quinto año.

translation.en: with Jacob since the fifth grade.
translation.es: Frankie ha estado enamorada de Jacob desde quinto año.

translation.en: What? No, no. No.
No. He's kinda my brother.
Come a- who? Stepbrother.
Or soon- to- be stepbrother.
Sorry, I just have really bad cramps.
Been there. TABBY: Same.
Can't relate, but sorry.
Um... LILY: What?
Hey, we should hang out after school this week.
translation.es: Acompáñanos después de las clases esta semana.

translation.en: Mm- hm. Yeah. Yeah.
Mom?
Hello?
Get out!
Oh, God.
Mmm. You want a sip?
Sure.
Mom! You know I can't control myself.
translation.es: - ¡Mamá! - Sabes que no me puedo controlar.

translation.en: That's very good. Okay, okay. Show me your dance moves.
translation.es: - Muy bien. - Enséñame cómo te mueves.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh.
That's so sweet.
Hey.
What's all that?
Oh...I just had to go through some paperwork for your new school, but you know me.
translation.es: Tenía que buscar unos documentos para tu nueva escuela.

translation.en: I put all the important shit in a shoebox, and it makes it impossible to find.
translation.es: Meto todo lo importante en una caja y jamás lo vuelvo a encontrar.

translation.en: Adam says he's gonna get me organized,
translation.es: Adam me va a ayudar. Los voy a llevar a su oficina.

translation.en: so I'm taking it down to the office,
translation.es: Adam me va a ayudar. Los voy a llevar a su oficina. Le advertí que no debe ser muy optimista.

translation.en: but I told him not to get his hopes up, so...
translation.es: Le advertí que no debe ser muy optimista.

translation.en: Hey, um, thanks for washing my jeans, by the way.
translation.es: Gracias por lavar mis jeans, por cierto.

translation.en: What jeans?
The ones I bled through today. I didn't.
translation.es: - Los que manché de sangre hoy. - Yo no fui.

translation.en: Maybe it was Adam.
Look who it is. Just in time for first period.
translation.es: Mira nada más. Justo a tiempo para el primer período.

translation.en: Timmy. You know what helps with cramps?
Sex.
GIRL: That was, like, insane.
TEACHER: Both of you, principal's office now.
translation.es: ¡Los dos, a la oficina del director!

translation.en: VOICE: Lily. What?
Ms. Schechner, who are you speaking to?
Didn't you just call my name?
VOICE: If you can hear this, you're our fourth.
translation.es: Si puedes escuchar esto, eres la cuarta.

translation.en: Go to the bathroom.
Yes? Can I go to the bathroom?
Sure. Make it quick.
VOICE: Take your stuff.
You need your backpack?
TIMMY: You didn't get the memo?
She's on the rag.
My bad.
That's good. Double detention. Anything else? For what?
Oh, shit! I told y'all haters she was the fourth!
translation.es: ¡Les dije a estas incrédulas que era la cuarta!

translation.en: FRANKIE: Yes, yes, y'all!
It's the motherfricking reckoning!
I can't even believe this. We on a other, other level.
translation.es: Esto es increíble. Esto es de otro nivel.

translation.en: What the hell, you guys?
We sent you a message telepathically.
Yeah. Just, like, telepathically communicating with you. NBD.
translation.es: Sí, nos comunicamos telepáticamente. No es para tanto.

translation.en: JK. It's, like, a VBD for sure, because now you're actually here and we on some shit IRL.
translation.es: Es BRMA, porque ahora estás aquí y esto es RL.

translation.en: Okay. Can somebody translate?
Okay. It was a test to see if your antennas were up.
translation.es: Fue una prueba para ver si tus antenas funcionaban.

translation.en: And they up! Way up.
They up! What do you mean? How?
Well, we practiced a lot of times, but we never got it quite right.
translation.es: Practicamos muchas veces, pero nunca nos salió bien.

translation.en: But, I mean, today, it was like...
Super Tampon to the rescue!
That's you. Sorry, is it too soon?
So how long have you been practicing?
Practicing? Yeah.
Oh. No, I never, like, practiced anything before.
translation.es: No. Yo nunca he practicado nada.

translation.en: Okay, so, like, when did you start getting a sense of your gift?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo te diste cuenta de tu don?

translation.en: What are you guys talking about?
What? FRANKIE: We're witches.
Take my hand. It's okay. Come with me. We're gonna learn a lot today.
translation.es: Está bien. Ven conmigo. Vamos a aprender mucho hoy.

translation.en: You're witches? Yep.
And you're a witch too!
translation.es: ¡Sí, y tú también eres una bruja!

translation.en: LILY: Sorry, this is all just a little new to me.
translation.es: Perdón, pero todo esto es nuevo para mí.

translation.en: TABBY: I mean, it's new to us too. We've never thrown a grown- ass man.
translation.es: Para nosotras también. Nunca habíamos arrojado a un hombre adulto.

translation.en: LOURDES: That was so wild!
Yeah, and, like, we all thought it at the same time.
translation.es: Y todas lo pensamos al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.es: Espera. ¿Qué? ¿No pensaste en darle un empujón?

translation.en: Tell me you didn't think about throwing his ass off of you.
Yeah, I did. LOURDES: Well, so did we!
And then, bam!
And that's just stage one, moving stuff with our minds.
translation.es: Y eso es solo el primer nivel, mover cosas con nuestras mentes.

translation.en: LOURDES: Or people, I guess, in Timmy's case.
translation.es: O personas, supongo, en el caso de Timmy.

translation.en: If he even counts as a person. True that. Anything.
translation.es: - Si él cuenta como persona. - Cierto.

translation.en: Stage two? That's what went down in detention.
translation.es: ¿Segundo nivel? Lo que pasó en el salón.

translation.en: That was so sick! And you said we couldn't do it.
translation.es: ¡Eso fue fabuloso! Y tú dijiste que no íbamos a poder.

translation.en: Stage three, we'll get to soon enough.
translation.es: Nivel tres, llegaremos dentro de poco.

translation.en: LOURDES: Let's surprise her, though.
Stage four, shape- shifting.
Shape- shifting.
You know, the power to take on a different form?
translation.es: El poder de cambiar de forma.

translation.en: And if we get to stage four, I'm low- key turning myself into Kristen Stewart.
translation.es: Si llegamos al nivel 4, me voy a convertir en Kristen Stewart.

translation.en: Don't judge. She's a Twilight stan.
translation.es: No la juzgues. Es fanática de Crepúsculo.

translation.en: Point is, we've never made it past stage one.
translation.es: Nunca hemos llegado más lejos del nivel uno.

translation.en: And then in walks Robert Pattinson.
Bro!
What? You tell me she's not giving off Edward Cullen vibes right now.
I'm sorry, can you guys just slow down? I'm having a hard time catching up.
translation.es: ¿Pueden desacelerar un poco? Me está costando ponerme al tanto.

translation.en: Okay, well, why don't you tell us a little about you. Yeah, like, what's your ancestry?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no nos cuentas un poco de ti? - Sí. ¿Cuál es tu linaje?

translation.en: Uh...I don't really know. I've never looked into it before.
translation.es: No lo sé. Nunca lo he investigado.

translation.en: FRANKIE: What about your mom?
Is she a witch?
She's a therapist from New Jersey.
translation.es: Es una terapeuta de New Jersey.

translation.en: It's gotta come from somewhere.
translation.es: Tiene que venir de algún lado.

translation.en: Yeah, you see, we've been looking for our fourth for a while now.
translation.es: Llevamos bastante tiempo buscando una cuarta.

translation.en: We thought we could form a coven, just us three--
translation.es: Pensamos que podríamos formar un aquelarre, solo las tres...

translation.en: It doesn't work like that.
No, because, you see, we each have an element that corresponds to a direction.
translation.es: No, porque cada una tiene un elemento que corresponde a una dirección.

translation.en: I'm fire.
Air. Earth.
So you've got North, South, East...
translation.es: Así que tenemos norte, sur, este...

translation.en: But West, that was a tough get.
translation.es: Pero oeste... era difícil de conseguir.

translation.en: LOURDES: And now you're here.
You're water. You're West.
Yeah, in order for us to have, like, maximum power,
we all need to be on our directions.
The term is calling the corners.
translation.es: El término es invocar las esquinas.

translation.en: This is a lot, but I am listening
and also working through a low- level panic attack.
translation.es: y también estoy lidiando con un pequeño ataque de pánico.

translation.en: Okay, we know that this is probably a lot to take in right now.
translation.es: Sabemos que es mucho que procesar,

translation.en: But you shouldn't run from your power.
translation.es: pero no debes huir de tu poder.

translation.en: None of us should.
That's what my mom always says.
translation.es: Eso dice mi mamá a menudo.

translation.en: Your difference is your power.
Oh, then Mom's cool.
So, what do you say?
Lily.
Oh, my God, Frankie.
Give me your hand. Come on.
Will you be our fourth?
Come on, I got bad knees.
Her ACLs are gonna tear.
You had me at shape- shifting into Kristen Stewart.
translation.es: Me convencieron cuando dijeron Kristen Stewart.

translation.en: She said yes! She said yes. Oh, my God!
Why didn't you just say yes originally?
I mean, witchcraft in general is such a charged word.
translation.es: La brujería en general es una palabra muy fuerte.

translation.en: We literally house babies in our stomachs.
translation.es: Literalmente amparamos bebés en nuestros estómagos.

translation.en: That's some Ridley Scott shit.
translation.es: Como en una película de Ridley Scott.

translation.en: We have superpowers without even trying.
I mean, not all of us can do that, but...
translation.es: Digo, no todas podemos hacerlo, pero...

translation.en: Shit. You know, point taken. My bad, Lou.
Yeah, it's all good. Y'all know trans girls got our own magick anyway.
translation.es: Descuida. Las chicas trans tenemos nuestra propia magia.

translation.en: Word. They do, they do.
That's why covens have always been so important.
translation.es: Por eso los aquelarres siempre han sido tan importantes.

translation.en: Because half the battle of having powers is believing you do.
translation.es: La mitad de la batalla para tener poderes es creer que los tienes.

translation.en: What are we doing?
Well, now that we got our fourth, we need to take our coven for a test drive.
translation.es: Ya que tenemos a la cuarta, debemos poner a prueba nuestro aquelarre.

translation.en: FRANKIE: Whenever we do a spell, we always cast a circle first.
translation.es: Para realizar un conjuro, siempre hay que hacer un círculo.

translation.en: Think of it as, you know, making a container to hold all of our energies.
translation.es: Considéralo como un contenedor para toda nuestra energía.

translation.en: And to keep the bad shit out.
translation.es: Y para que no entre nada malo.

translation.en: Breathe.
Listen to the sound of the trees breathing along with you.
translation.es: Escuchen a los árboles respirando junto a ustedes.

translation.en: Feel yourself rooted into the ground and into this moment.
translation.es: Sientan su conexión con la tierra y con este momento.

translation.en: We transcend time.
We suspend fate.
We bear the three keys.
Oh, shit.
We open the triple gate.
FRANKIE, LOURDES & TABBY: The air, the fire, the water, the earth
translation.es: El aire, el fuego, el agua, la tierra.

translation.en: Return, return, return
The air, the fire, the water, the earth
translation.es: El aire, el fuego, el agua, la tierra.

translation.en: Return, return, return
Guys.
Holy shit.
Damn!
LOURDES: Oh, my God! That was so fricking cool!
That was brazy, though!
Never?
Yo! No, no, no. No!
FRANKIE: That's stage three, baby.
translation.es: ¡Eso es del tercer nivel! Si pudimos hacer eso, ¿qué debemos hacer ahora?

translation.en: TABBY: Okay, but if we could do that, now what should we do?
translation.es: Si pudimos hacer eso, ¿qué debemos hacer ahora?

translation.en: Why are we at Timmy's house? He's a terrorist.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué estamos en casa de Timmy? - Es un terrorista.

translation.en: That's a little extreme. We don't wanna hurt him, though, right?
translation.es: Eso es un poco exagerado. No queremos lastimarlo, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Why not?
No, she's right. Hexing is serious.
translation.es: Tiene razón. Maldecirlo es algo grave.

translation.en: So is harassment.

translation.es: Mi hijo perdió a un amigo hoy.

translation.en: No. No, we all face tragedy every day.
translation.es: No. Todos confrontamos tragedias a diario.

translation.en: The question is, how do we face it?
It's okay.
Dad, no. It's okay.
You're not weak.
You're not weak.
He was weak.
It's okay.
You're not weak.
ADAM: Can't sleep?
Me neither.
Lily, I wanna apologize...
for being so tough on you.
translation.es: por haber sido tan duro contigo.

translation.en: You know, it wasn't always so easy for me, raising three boys on my own.
translation.es: No siempre fue fácil para mí criar a tres hijos por mi cuenta.

translation.en: I had to set very strict rules and keep 'em in line.
translation.es: Tuve que poner reglas estrictas para controlarlos.

translation.en: I know that's not how you and your mom operate...
translation.es: Sé que no es lo que tú y tu mamá acostumbran, así que...

translation.en: I wanted to say that I'm sorry.
Thanks.
I know you were close to Timmy too.
translation.es: Sé que también eras cercana a Timmy.

translation.en: I saw you checking out the old family crest, huh?
translation.es: Estabas viendo el escudo de la familia.

translation.en: It's actually pretty cool. These go back centuries.
translation.es: Es bastante cool. Datan de hace muchos siglos.

translation.en: You know, um, snakes are usually considered scary or dangerous,
translation.es: Las serpientes se consideran aterradoras o peligrosas,

translation.en: but actually in pagan culture, they were symbols of rebirth.
translation.es: pero en la cultura pagana, eran símbolos de la reencarnación.

translation.en: Anyway, it's getting late. To be continued.
Lily? Are you okay?
Honey. Honey, what happened?
We're not safe. What?
We're not safe here. Wait, listen.
translation.es: - No estamos a salvo aquí. - Espera. Escucha.

translation.en: Take a breath. Tell me what happened.
He's dangerous. Who?
Adam. I'm telling you. What? Did something happen?
Last night, he said...
And I saw... He had a...
I just really think we need to go.
translation.es: En serio creo que debemos irnos.

translation.en: I just really think we should go.
Honestly, Lily, you are going through a lot right now.
translation.es: La verdad, estás pasando por muchas cosas en este momento, y...

translation.en: Okay, um...
Let us go somewhere new. Huh? Let's just take a road trip, just take a weekend,
translation.es: Vayamos a un lugar nuevo. Un paseo un auto, un fin de semana.

translation.en: just the two of us, somewhere cool, somewhere fun.
translation.es: Las dos nada más. A un lugar cool, un lugar divertido.

translation.en: That could be good, right?
We just need to make it through the funeral.
translation.es: Solo tenemos que ir al funeral.

translation.en: Then I'll make it right.
There's gotta be something here that proves it.
translation.es: Tiene que haber algo aquí que lo demuestre.

translation.en: You ready?
Lily, we gotta go.
What the hell is this?
Where did you find that?
You never told me?
It's complicated. No, it's really not.
translation.es: - Es complicado. - En realidad, no lo es.

translation.en: It's, like, a simple conversation that should have happened a long time ago.
translation.es: Es una simple conversación que debimos tener hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: No. You don't--
Hold on. Hold on. No.
translation.es: No. Tú no... Un momento. Un momento. No.

translation.en: Don't touch me!
Oh, God.
What?
Say it!
It wasn't entirely up to me.
translation.es: No era solo una decisión mía.

translation.en: Oh, really? Who else would it have been up to, Mom?
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿De quién más iba a ser, mamá?

translation.en: It was your birth mother.
It was the one condition that she had,
translation.es: Fue la única condición que impuso.

translation.en: that I never reveal to you, and she's...
translation.es: Que nunca te revelara, y ella es...

translation.en: She didn't want you to know that you were adopted,
translation.es: No quería que supieras que eras adoptada.

translation.en: and I made a promise to her and...
It was such a...
God, it was a complicated...
Why would she want that? 'Cause she...
She had undergone
some trauma.
I was assigned to her at the crisis center here and...
translation.es: Me la asignaron en el centro de ayuda y...

translation.en: Baby, I'm so sorry.
You guys, I need to talk to you.
translation.es: Oigan, tengo que hablar con ustedes.

translation.en: I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.es: No creo que sea buena idea.

translation.en: Listen to me. Please.
There's no one else I can trust.
translation.es: Son las únicas en quienes puedo confiar.

translation.en: Fine.
You all right?
I need to take her away from here.
I need to put her first.
LOURDES: You guys, she's not gonna harm anyone. She already did.
translation.es: - Oigan, no va a lastimar a nadie. - Ya lo hizo.

translation.en: She's just going through some shit.
translation.es: Solo está pasando por un mal momento.

translation.en: Yeah, well, what happened to our number one rule of the craft?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con la regla número uno de la hechicería?

translation.en: If a person is a danger to herself or others, they will be bound.
translation.es: Si una persona es un peligro para ella o para otros, hay que atarla.

translation.en: She used her powers irresponsibly.
translation.es: Usó sus poderes de modo irresponsable.

translation.en: End of story.
But, like, are we any better, though?
I mean, like, what we did to Timmy.
translation.es: Digo, lo que le hicimos a Timmy...

translation.en: That wasn't consensual either.
translation.es: Eso tampoco fue con su consentimiento.

translation.en: Well, then maybe we should bind ourselves too.
translation.es: Tal vez también deberíamos atarnos nosotras.

translation.en: We are bound to each other
translation.es: Nos atamos una a la otra...

translation.en: and bound from magick.
We prevent ourselves from doing harm.
We relinquish our powers from this day forth.
translation.es: Renunciamos a nuestros poderes de este día en adelante.

translation.en: ALL: So mote it be.
Let's go.
What?
You were right.
I never should've brought you here.
But I need you to agree to one thing.
translation.es: Pero necesito que accedas a una cosa.

translation.en: Whatever this is, whatever's happening here...
translation.es: Sea lo que sea esto, sea lo que sea lo que está pasando,

translation.en: I need you to stop it.
What do you mean?
I should've told you.
Not just about your birth mother, but about...
translation.es: No solo lo de tu madre,

translation.en: About these...
These powers.
Whatever you call them, Lily, they're-- You knew?
translation.es: - O como quieras llamarlos. Son... - ¿Lo sabías?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I was warned...
that your legacy was a curse.
translation.es: que tu legado era una maldición.

translation.en: And that the second they came online, I would have to stop them in their tracks, so Lily--
translation.es: Y que en cuanto se manifestaran tendría que pararlos en seco.

translation.en: Lily, please.
let me take the burden for you.
translation.es: Déjame quitarte esta carga de encima.

translation.en: Let me take your curse so you don't have to carry it.
translation.es: Dame tu maldición para que tú no tengas que cargarla.

translation.en: It has been so painful, you can't imagine...
translation.es: Ha sido tan doloroso, no te puedes imaginar...

translation.en: to watch you understand that you were different and not know why.
translation.es: verte comprender que eras diferente y no saber por qué.

translation.en: Now you can see why your difference...
translation.es: Ahora puedes ver por qué tu diferencia...

translation.en: is dangerous.
But I need you to say it with me, Lily.
translation.es: Pero necesito que lo digas conmigo.

translation.en: In the name of Manon...
I give you my power.
You can trust me.
I'm your mother.
My mother would never tell me my difference is dangerous.
translation.es: Mi madre jamás me diría que mi diferencia es peligrosa.

translation.en: Guys?
He...
killed...
me.
You guys.
Who is it?
LOURDES: T...
Y.
Uh- oh.
Those don't seem to be working anymore.
Thanks to your so- called friends.
You see, that's the thing about girls with power, Lily.
translation.es: Ese es el problema de las chicas con poder.

translation.en: They're always too weak not to use it against each other.
translation.es: Son débiles y no evitan usarlo unas contra las otras.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
That's an excellent question.
Oh, you see, Lily....
I want your power.
Where's my mother?
Which one?
Helen.
She's tied up at the moment.
translation.es: Está atada de manos en este momento.

translation.en: Your real mom....
Well, she's tied up too, in a different way.
translation.es: Ella también está atada... en otro sentido.

translation.en: You're a lot like her.
You know, she fought it at first,
translation.es: Ella también se resistió al principio.

translation.en: but eventually she gave in.
translation.es: Pero con el tiempo, se dio por vencida.

translation.en: You see, Lily, in order to gain a witch's power, she has to give them up voluntarily.
translation.es: Verás, para adquirir el poder de una bruja, ella tiene que renunciar a él.

translation.en: So you do have a choice here.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
translation.es: Podemos hacer esto por las buenas o por las malas.

translation.en: You'll have to kill me first.
So the easy way.
You guys came for me.
There's no I in sisterhood, baby.
translation.es: No existe el yo en una hermandad.

translation.en: There is definitely an I in sisterhood. FRANKIE: You get my meaning.
translation.es: - Hay varias yo en una hermandad. - Tú me entiendes.

translation.en: What we were saying was.... We're sorry.
translation.es: - Lo que decíamos era... - Que lo lamentamos.

translation.en: We love you, and we unbind you, Lily.
translation.es: Te amamos y te soltamos, Lily.

translation.en: Guys.
You girls ought to be careful in the woods at night.
translation.es: Deben tener cuidado en el bosque de noche.

translation.en: A lot of weirdos out here.
We are the weirdos, mister.
You see, Lily, power is order.
It belongs in the hands of those who understand it.
translation.es: Debe permanecer en manos de los que lo comprenden.

translation.en: It's been that way for thousands of years.
translation.es: Ha sido así durante miles de años.

translation.en: Timmy's a good example of that.
translation.es: Timmy es un buen ejemplo de eso.

translation.en: Until you tried to make him in your own image.
translation.es: Hasta que intentaron hacerlo a su propia imagen.

translation.en: So then I had to kill him...
to restore the order.
Because we are not in your image.
translation.es: Porque no estamos hechos a tu imagen.

translation.en: We are your rulers and kings.
The thing is, Lily,
you got yourself here.
translation.es: que eres responsable de llegar hasta aquí.

translation.en: But you're playing with fire,
and I'm gonna watch you burn.
TABBY: South.
LOURDES: East.
FRANKIE: North.
Where do you think you're going?
West.
GIRLS : Air, fire, water, earth.
GIRLS : Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire.
Now it's your turn to burn.
translation.es: Ahora te toca a ti arder.

translation.en: Big day.
Text us after, okay?
I will.
And take pics.
That I can't promise.
Hey, girls.
Hey, Ms. Schechner. Hi.
How's the warlock dating pool treatin' ya? Are you steering clear?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va lo de salir con brujos? ¿Lo está evitando?

translation.en: LILY: Frankie!
What? It's too soon?
A little, yeah.
FRANKIE: It's just a joke.
But, also, not really because we almost did die.
translation.es: Pero, en realidad, no, porque casi nos morimos.

translation.en: We get it.
All right, let's hit the road, baby girl.
Good luck. Thank you.
Hey, you got this.
Love you. Love you.
LILY: Love you. FRANKIE: I love you.
You ready?
Hi.
I'm looking for...
And what is your relation?
Can I help you?
My name is Lily.
And, um...
I'm your daughter.
